title: Authentic Thai tom yum soup
ingredients: ['680ml (1 pint 4 fl oz) chicken stock', '1 tablespoon tom yum paste', '1/2 clove garlic, finely chopped', '3 stalks lemon grass, chopped', '2 kaffir lime leaves, (available in jars)', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - cut into thin strips', '110g (4 oz) fresh mushrooms, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh green chilli', '1 bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '1 sprig fresh basil, chopped']
